articles.author: Allison Bray
articles.title: Mick Wallace says Russia has 'genuine security concerns' as he and Clare Daly defend opposition to EU motion - Independent.ie
articles.description: MEPs Clare Daly and Mick Wallace last night stood by their opposition to a European Parliament motion against the Russian invasion of Ukraine.
articles.content:
MEPs Clare Daly and Mick Wallace last night stood by their opposition to a European Parliament motion against the Russian invasion of Ukraine.

articles.title: Russia Wants Armed Drones From China For Ukraine War, US Warns Europe - NDTV
articles.description: The U.S. has warned European allies that Russia asked China for armed drones in late February as it was beginning its invasion of Ukraine, according to people familiar with the matter.
articles.content:
The request has alarmed Biden administration officials.
The U.S. has warned European allies that Russia asked China for armed drones in late February as it was beginning its invasion of Ukraine, acc… [+3205 chars]

articles.title: Canada's new electric-vehicle registrations soar in 2021 but still lag behind Europe - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
articles.description: More new electric vehicles hit the road in Canada last year than ever before but the growth is nowhere near what is happening in Europe.
articles.content:
OTTAWA - More new electric vehicles hit the road in Canada last year than ever before but the growth is nowhere near what is happening in Europe.
